rules_text:
Sacrifice a creature: Until end of turn, Advocate of Foibles gets +2/+0 and becomes an Demon in addition to its other types.
{1}{B}{G}: Amass Soldiers 1. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It’s also a Soldier. If you don’t control one, create an 0/0 black Soldier Army creature token first.)[/i]
